title: Got banned
body: So guys i got banned some weeks ago(about 11 days) because i made a account transfer by fail and wanted go back to my server because of lag.If i have done anything wrong tell me,and give me a chance,there i speed my time when im boring please give me a second chance.Thaank you!

replies.body: Ahhhh it looks like this account had some rather suspicious activity going on, which means there's a decent chance someone was trying to steal this account from you. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to get you back on the Rift after you verify yourself as the account creator!
